Class CsvBlockDescriptor.BlockLimitBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.engio.blox.blockdef.CsvBlockDescriptor.BlockLimitBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    CsvBlockDescriptor

    public class CsvBlockDescriptor.BlockLimitBuilder
extends Object
implements CsvBlockDescriptor.BlockLimitBuilderStage1, CsvBlockDescriptor.BlockLimitBuilderStage2
    A block limit builder is an intermediate object for convenient creation of IBlockLimitDetector
    Author:
    Benjamin Diedrichsen

      CsvBlockDescriptor pattern(String regex)
      Configures the block limit (either end or begin, depending on which method was called before) using a regular expression that will be matched against the line content.
